title: FindMyMeal

Deployed to the App Store June 2024

title: Announcements Feature
description: Created an Announcement feature on UNC's CS department website using Angular, TypeScript, and Python
Constructed backend services and database entities to handle complex relationships with data structures

title: DyslexiQuiz
description: iOS application created at HackNC2023 to revolutionize the way kids with dyslexia learn to read and write
Won Best UI/UX Hack out of 80 submissions

title: Akari
description: Working replication of popular Akari game developed using JavaFX

title: Foody
description: Collaborated with a team of 4 people to create an app that uses OpenAI to give the user recipe suggestions based on personalized pantry items

title: SocialExperiment
description: Interactive and user-friendly social media website with posting, direct messaging, and commenting features

title: Chick-Fil-A UI
description: Detailed replication of mobile Chick-Fil-A app with over 15 views

title: Playlist Maker
description: Java terminal game in which user has control over creating and editing a personal music playlist

title: Spotify UI
description: Identical replica of Spotify's play screen of Billy Joel's famous song, Vienna

title: Grocery List
description: Grocery list with adding, deleting, and clearing implementation

title: iExpense
description: Tool for calculating the price per person of a meal, including tip. Utilizes MVVM architecture
